series to supervised() function below implements this behavior, allowing you to specify the
number of lag observations to use in the input and the number to use in the output for each
sample. It will also remove rows that have NaN values as they cannot be used to train or test a
model.
# transform list into supervised learning format
def series_to_supervised(data, n_in, n_out=1):
